content:
The festival that Harmony Hearts performed in on chapter 4 is the "Summer Serenade Music Festival"

Summer Serenade Music Festival is a local music festival held annually in the summer months, featuring a wide variety of music genres from local and regional performers. It's a perfect opportunity for amateur and up-and-coming musicians to showcase their talents and gain exposure. The festival is held in an open-air park, and it attracts thousands of music lovers from the local community and surrounding areas. The festival provides a platform for emerging artists to share their music and connect with their fans. It's a perfect opportunity for Harmony Hearts to showcase their talents and establish themselves as a new force in the local music scene.
